context: The story sees <b9_0>Bond<b9_0/> pitted against the global criminal organisation <a0_0><b11_0><b12_0><b13_0>Spectre<b13_0/><b12_0/><b11_0/><a0_0/>, marking the group's first appearance in an Eon Productions film since <a8_0><b10_0>1971<b10_0/><a8_0/>'s <a1_0>Diamonds Are Forever<a1_0/>,[N 2] and tying Craig's series of films together with an overarching storyline. Several recurring James Bond characters, including <a2_0><a5_0>M, Q and Eve Moneypenny<a5_0/><a2_0/> return, with the new additions of <a6_0>Léa Seydoux<a6_0/> as Dr. Madeleine Swann, <a3_0><a7_0>Dave Bautista<a7_0/><a3_0/> as Mr. Hinx, Andrew Scott as Max Denbigh and Monica Bellucci as <a4_0>Lucia Sciarra<a4_0/>.
